alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Fairfield and north central Richland Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Springdale to near Killian. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Dentsville, Lake Carolina, Killian, Villages at Sandhill, Blythewood, Ridgeway, Winnsboro Mills, Smallwood, and Cedar Creek Fire Station. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 82 and 83. Interstate 77 between mile markers 19 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
